text:
Frame-by-frame state-action description

1. State: All three objects on desk; drawer closed. Action: Move to middle drawer handle.
2. State: At handle. Action: Close gripper to grasp handle.
3. State: Handle grasped. Action: Pull drawer open.
4. State: Drawer open. Action: Release handle.
5. State: Ready to pick first item (blue cube far left). Action: Return to home.
6. State: From home. Action: Move above blue cube.
7. State: Above cube. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above.
8. State: ~3 cm above. Action: Rotate to grasp angle.
9. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
10. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp cube.
11. State: Cube grasped. Action: Raise to clear drawer edge.
12. State: Raised. Action: Translate over open drawer.
13. State: Over drawer. Action: Open gripper to drop cube inside.
14. State: Blue cube in drawer. Action: Return to home.
15. State: Drawer open; ball center; red cube near drawer. Action: Move above ball.
16. State: Above ball. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above.
17. State: ~3 cm above. Action: Rotate to grasp angle.
18. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
19. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp ball.
20. State: Ball grasped. Action: Raise to clear drawer edge.
21. State: Raised. Action: Translate over open drawer.
22. State: Over drawer. Action: Open gripper to drop ball (lands partly on lip).
23. State: Ball precarious on lip (failure). Action: Return to home.
24. State: Need red cube repositioning. Action: Move above red cube.
25. State: Above red cube. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above.
26. State: ~3 cm above. Action: Rotate to cube grasp angle.
27. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
28. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp red cube.
29. State: Red cube grasped. Action: Translate left along desk (drag) to clear drawer area.
30. State: Cube left of arm base. Action: Open gripper to release.
31. State: Cube released safely left. Action: Return to home.
32. State: Recover ball placement. Action: Move above ball on lip.
33. State: Above ball. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above.
34. State: ~3 cm above. Action: Rotate to grasp angle.
35. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
36. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp ball.
37. State: Ball grasped. Action: Raise to clear drawer edge.
38. State: Raised. Action: Translate over open drawer.
39. State: Over drawer. Action: Open gripper to release ball fully inside.
40. State: Ball placed inside. Action: Return to home.
41. State: Ready to place red cube. Action: Move above red cube (left).
42. State: Above red cube. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above.
43. State: ~3 cm above. Action: Rotate to cube grasp angle.
44. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
45. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp red cube.
46. State: Red cube grasped. Action: Raise to clear drawer edge.
47. State: Raised. Action: Translate over open drawer.
48. State: Over drawer. Action: Open gripper to drop red cube inside.
49. State: All items in drawer. Action: Move above drawer front to prepare push-close.
50. State: Above drawer front. Action: Lower and rotate flat to contact drawer.
51. State: In contact. Action: Push drawer closed.
52. State: Drawer closed; task complete. Action: Return to home.

New run / continuation
53. State: Drawer open; blue cube inside; ball on lip; red cube left of center. Gripper above red cube. Action: Lower and pitch vertical to ~3 cm above red cube.
54. State: ~3 cm above red cube. Action: Rotate to cube grasp angle.
55. State: Aligned. Action: Lower to grasp height.
56. State: At grasp height. Action: Close gripper to grasp red cube.
57. State: Red cube grasped. Action: Raise to clear drawer edge.
58. State: Raised. Action: Translate over open drawer, avoiding ball on lip.
59. State: Over drawer. Action: Open gripper to drop red cube inside.
60. State: Red cube inside; ball still on lip. Action: Return to home.
61. State: Plan to re-grasp ball. Action: Move toward area above ball on lip.
62. State: Approach constrained; collision risk with drawer front. Action: Adjust pose to search for safe top-down approach.
63. State: Approach remains unsafe. Action: Abort and return to home to re-plan.

Analysis

- Strategy adherence: The plan to open drawer, place items, and close it was largely followed. A recurring failure mode occurred when the ball landed on the drawer lip, creating a constrained approach with collision risk, leading to an abort (frames 61â€“63).

What to do next (high level)

- Create clearance before re-grasping the ball:
  - Option A: Pull the drawer further open to increase vertical clearance, then perform a top-down grasp of the ball and release it inside.
  - Option B: Use a controlled lateral push from a safe side approach to nudge the ball fully into the drawer, then verify placement.
- After securing the ball, close the drawer and return to home.

Choose the option that yields the safest, collision-free path given current geometry; opening the drawer further (Option A) is generally preferred for reliable top-down grasp.
